verses.text: \w Is|strong="H1571"\w* it possible \w for|strong="H1571"\w* Leviathan \w to|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* pulled \w out|strong="H2904"\w* \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* fish-hook, \w or|strong="H0408"\w* \w for|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* hook \w to|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* put through \w the|strong="H1571"\w* bone \w of|strong="H4758"\w* \w his|strong="H1571"\w* mouth?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* put \w a|strong="H3588"\w* cord into \w his|strong="H6440"\w* nose, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3320"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* away \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* cord round \w his|strong="H6440"\w* tongue?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* make prayers \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w or|strong="H4310"\w* say soft words \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*?

\w Will|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* make an \w agreement|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* take him \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* servant \w for|strong="H3808"\w* ever?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w make|strong="H1540"\w* sport \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* bird? \w or|strong="H4310"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* chains \w for|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* young women?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fishermen make profit \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*? \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* have \w him|strong="H6440"\w* cut up \w for|strong="H8127"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* traders?
\w Will|strong="H1346"\w* you put sharp-pointed irons into \w his|strong="H5462"\w* skin, or fish-spears into \w his|strong="H5462"\w* head?

\w Only|strong="H0259"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* hand \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w see|strong="H0935"\w* what \w a|strong="H0935"\w* fight \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w*; \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* again!

Truly, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* hope \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* attacker \w is|strong="H0376"\w* false; \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* overcome \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H3808"\w* seeing \w him|strong="H1692"\w*!

He \w is|strong="H0216"\w* so cruel \w that|strong="H5869"\w* no one \w is|strong="H0216"\w* ready \w to|strong="H5869"\w* go \w against|strong="H5869"\w* him. Who then \w is|strong="H0216"\w* able \w to|strong="H5869"\w* keep \w his|strong="H5869"\w* place \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H1980"\w* ever \w went|strong="H1980"\w* against \w me|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w got|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* better \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w me|strong="H1980"\w*? There \w is|strong="H6310"\w* no \w one|strong="H6310"\w* under heaven!

I \w will|strong="H6227"\w* not keep quiet \w about|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* parts \w of|strong="H1731"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* body, or \w about|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* power, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* strength \w of|strong="H1731"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* frame.

\w Who|strong="H5315"\w* \w has|strong="H3318"\w* ever \w taken|strong="H3318"\w* \w off|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* outer skin? \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* inside \w his|strong="H3318"\w* inner coat \w of|strong="H6310"\w* iron?

Who has made \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* doors \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*? Fear \w is|strong="H6440"\w* round about \w his|strong="H6440"\w* teeth.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* back \w is|strong="H1320"\w* made \w of|strong="H5921"\w* lines \w of|strong="H5921"\w* plates, \w joined|strong="H1692"\w* tight \w together|strong="H5921"\w*, \w one|strong="H1320"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* other, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* stamp.
One \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w so|strong="H3644"\w* near \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3332"\w* other \w that|strong="H3820"\w* no air \w may|strong="H3820"\w* come between them.
They take \w a|strong="H2398"\w* grip \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w one|strong="H0410"\w* another; they are joined together, so that they may not be parted.

\w His|strong="H6965"\w* sneezings give \w out|strong="H6965"\w* flames, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* eyes are like \w the|strong="H6965"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* dawn.
Out \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth go burning lights, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* flames \w of|strong="H6086"\w* fire \w are|strong="H1270"\w* jumping up.
Smoke comes out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* nose, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* pot boiling \w on|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* fire.
\w His|strong="H2803"\w* breath puts fire \w to|strong="H2803"\w* coals, \w and|strong="H7494"\w* \w a|strong="H2803"\w* flame goes out \w of|strong="H2803"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth.
Strength is \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neck, \w and|strong="H8478"\w* fear goes dancing \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7760"\w* plates \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* flesh are joined \w together|strong="H3220"\w*, fixed, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* not \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* moved.

\w His|strong="H0310"\w* heart \w is|strong="H8415"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* strong \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H2803"\w* stone, hard \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* lower crushing-stone.

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* gets ready \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fight, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strong \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w overcome|strong="H0369"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H2844"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w may|strong="H1121"\w* come \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w* able \w to|strong="H5921"\w* go \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spear, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w arrow|strong="H1121"\w*, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sharp-pointed iron.
Iron is to him as dry grass, and brass as soft wood.
The arrow is not able to put him to flight: stones are no more to him than dry stems.
A thick stick is no better than a leaf of grass, and he makes sport of the onrush of the spear.
Under him are sharp edges of broken pots: as if he was pulling a grain-crushing instrument over the wet earth.
The deep is boiling like a pot of spices, and the sea like a perfume-vessel.
After him his way is shining, so that the deep seems white.
On earth there is not another like him, who is made without fear.
Everything which is high goes in fear of him; he is king over all the sons of pride.
